0.0.1: Fixed changelog list UI not scrolling (overflow)
Changed background color of logo to orange
0.0.2: Fixed reverse list order in versions tab
Added fix for potential future error location (mod icon)
0.1.0: Updated mod to support PolyTrack version 0.5.1
0.1.1: Fixed non updated mod icons not loading
Fixed reverse list order in versions tab

shortdesc: A mod which allows you to see a library of other PolyModLoader mods along with additional info such as changelog and version info.
